title: Best of The Herd: 02/18/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 02/18/2019
description:
Colin thought the NBA all-star game pointed out that the Durant/Westbrook divorce was the most lopsided in recent sports history.  He talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend.  Plus, NBA Champion Matt Barnes explains why Anthony Davis is being so diplomatic; pretending he would play for any team in the league.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
